did.abstract: Two orderly books dating from 1812 to 1813 and containing general and regimental orders issued by the New York State Adjutant General, head of the New York State Militia, at headquarters in New York City. Orders from other military officials are also included.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); New York State orderly books, 1977.062, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.
